configuration

Class BatchClassifierConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.BatchClassifierConfig

  • public class BatchClassifierConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a configuration class for batch classification testing, which allows the batch tester to be invoked from other parts of the code, as well as allowing customizable file format for saving the configuration. In this case, it supports JSON I/O, which makes it easy to automatically generate classification evaluation requests from external code.

    • Method Detail

      • dataIndexIsForOpenML

        public boolean dataIndexIsForOpenML(int datasetIndex)
        Check whether a dataset that is listed is an openML task or an ordinary local dataset. The index that is given as a parameter is the index of the dataset in the list of datasets parsed from the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        datasetIndex - Integer that is the index of the dataset in the list of datasets parsed from the configuration file.
        Returns:
        True if the corresponding dataset is of OpenML variety or false if it is a local dataset.

      • getOpenMLConnector

        public HMOpenMLConnector getOpenMLConnector()
        Returns:
        OpenMLConnector object corresponding to the provided authentication specification.

      • toJsonString

        public java.lang.String toJsonString()
        This method prints the classification configuration to a Json string.
        Returns:
        String that is the Json representation of this classification configuration.

      • fromJsonString

        public static BatchClassifierConfig fromJsonString(java.lang.String jsonString)
        This method loads the classification configuration from a Json string.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - String that is the Json representation of the classification configuration.
        Returns:
        BatchClassifierConfig corresponding to the Json string.
